author: rubys
msg: Added doc for new trax support for the <style> task.  Also minor reflowing
of lines in WHATSNEW to fit into 80 columns.

author: bodewig
msg: Reset the global flags that say we have a MANIFEST.MF/web.xml after
<jar> would print a warning in Ant's own bootstrap when it zipped

author: conor
msg: Add some error checking to new TSTAMP format element
Documentation fro tstamp and javac changes

author: conor
msg: Provide a failonerror attribute for javac. This defaults to true. If you set it to
false, an error is logged but the build will continue.
Based on the idea by Ken Wood.
